trans-unit.source: Represents a query that tests whether a message satisfies the requirements of a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 表示測試訊息是否符合指定之端點位址需求的查詢。

trans-unit.source: This filter tests whether a message satisfies a particular endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 這個篩選條件會測試訊息是否符合特定端點位址。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> object includes a URI and an optional collection of addressing headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> 物件會包含 URI 和選擇性定址標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: The addressing and message headers are canonicalized in order to be compared for equality.
trans-unit.target: 定址和訊息標頭會經過標準化，以便比較它們是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter appears more than once in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>, the corresponding header must appear in the message at least that many times.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> 中出現一次以上，對應的標頭也必須至少出現在訊息中相同次數。

trans-unit.source: IIS and the underlying file system (NTFS or FAT) are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: IIS 和基礎檔案系統 (NTFS 或 FAT) 會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: URI comparisons done by this class are also case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別所執行的 URI 比較也會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: So, for example, http://www.microsoft.com is evaluated as equal to http://WWW.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 因此，範例，http://www.microsoft.com評估為等於http://WWW.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> against which messages are tested.
trans-unit.target: 測試訊息時所依據的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class with a specified address against which to test a message.
trans-unit.target: 使用測試訊息時所依據的指定位址，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> against which messages are tested.
trans-unit.target: 測試訊息時所依據的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機名稱包含在端點位址比較中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的本機電腦上有安裝 Web 服務，則有許多對等方式可以用來參考這個位址，包括：

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `includeHostNameInComparison` parameter is `false`, the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `includeHostNameInComparison` 參數值為 `false`，則上述 URI 全都會解析為相同的端點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the address that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> tests messages against.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> 測試訊息時所依據的位址。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> tests messages against.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> 測試訊息時所依據的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Data associated with the filters in the table.
trans-unit.target: 與資料表中篩選條件相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new filter table that tests a message against multiple endpoint addresses simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 建立會同時依據多個端點位址來測試訊息的新篩選資料表。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable`1" /> interface that can contain <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" />s with associated <paramref name="FilterData" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable`1" /> 介面的物件，這個介面可以包含 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> 與相關聯的 <paramref name="FilterData" />。

trans-unit.source: The method returns an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> that is optimized to test for specific message endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會傳回已針對測試特定訊息端點完成最佳化之 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> constructors to create filter table instances.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 建構函式 (Constructor)，即可建立篩選資料表執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出主機名稱是否包含在端點位址比較中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機名稱包含在端點位址比較中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的本機電腦上有安裝 Web 服務，則有許多對等方式可以用來參考這個位址，包括：

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `false`, so the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint, unless you change this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 `false`，因此除非您變更這個屬性，否則上述 URI 全都會解析為相同的端點。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message or buffered message satisfies the criteria of the endpoint filter.
trans-unit.target: 測試訊息或緩衝訊息是否符合端點篩選器的準則。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two overloads of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.Match%2A> method is that the one that takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter is permitted to examine the body of a message when testing for a match, while the one that takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> parameter is not.
trans-unit.target: 兩個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.Match%2A> 方法多載之間的差異在於，接受 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> 參數的多載可以在測試是否相符時檢查訊息的本文，而另一個接受 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 參數的多載則不可以。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.Match%2A> does not test the contents of the body of a message, so these two methods are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.Match%2A> 並不會測試訊息本文的內容，所以這兩個方法是對等的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 測試訊息是否符合指定的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> object satisfies the endpoint address specified in the filter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 物件符合篩選條件中指定的端點位址，則為 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The two overloads of this method are equivalent because they both examine only message headers.
trans-unit.target: 因為這兩個方法多載只會檢查訊息標頭，所以是對等的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a buffered message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 測試緩衝的訊息是否符合指定的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> object satisfies the endpoint address; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 物件符合端點位址，則為 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The two overloads of this method are equivalent because they both examine only message headers.
trans-unit.target: 因為這兩個方法多載只會檢查訊息標頭，所以是對等的。

trans-unit.source: The only reason to use this overload is if you already had a `messageBuffer` available and not a message, because this method converts the `messageBuffer` into a message.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個方法會將 `messageBuffer` 轉換為訊息，所以使用這個多載的唯一時機是當您已經有可用的 `messageBuffer` 而沒有訊息時。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="messageBuffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageBuffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
